trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_SEQ_00<tab>Memezofu is once again in dire need of reagents.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_SEQ_01<tab>Memezofu requires a pair of ahriman corneas to continue making medicine. Slay ahrimans to procure the reagent.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_SEQ_02<tab>You now have two ahriman corneas. See them to Memezofu's hands.

TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_SEQ_03<tab>Memezofu remarks that it takes only a bit of the reagent to cure a great many wounds, but the alchemist is fully aware that an onze of prevention is worth a ponze of cure.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_TODO_00<tab>Slay ahrimans and obtain their corneas.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the ahriman corneas to Memezofu.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_MEMEZOFU_000_000<tab>I am loath to ask more of one who has already done so much, but rarely do I chance to meet such a reliable adventurer.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_MEMEZOFU_000_001<tab>The winds of change blow constantly here on the fore, fanning the flames of war to burn ever faster through my stock of reagents.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_MEMEZOFU_000_002<tab>In particular, I have urgent need of ahriman corneas at the moment, and fear I have no other I can ask. Might I trouble you to procure these for me?
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_DUMMY_000_000<tab>Slay two ahrimans and acquire two ahriman corneas.

TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_MEMEZOFU_000_010<tab>Magnificent! Precisely the reagent I requested. Its appearance is far from appetizing, I'll give you, but trust that its medicinal efficacy more than makes up for it.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_MEMEZOFU_000_020<tab>This small sample shall suffice to synthesize a goodly amount of coagulant, which serves to stem bleeding.
TEXT_GAIUSC910_01045_MEMEZOFU_000_021<tab>I can naught but hope that an end to the bloodshed comes before an end to the salve does.
